Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Ranged 10

+17 vs AC; 1d4+5 damage.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Tanris makes two basic (melee or ranged) attacks

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+17 vs AC; 1d4+5 damage, and the target is grabbed and takes a -2 penalty to escape checks to escape the grab.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Targets one creature grabbed by Tanris

+17 vs AC; 3d6+5 damage.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Free

Targets the escaping enemy

Trigger: When an enemy grabbed by tanris escapes, at-will

+17 vs AC; 2d4+5 damage.

Encounter ✦ Lightning

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 2

+14 vs Reflex; 2d10 lightning damage. Effect: Tanris gains fly 6 until the end of his next turn.

At-Will

Opportunity

Trigger: When an enemy hits or misses tanris

Tanris takes only half damage from the hit, and the grabbed creature takes the rest. If the attack misses and deals damage on a miss, Tanris takes no damage and the grabbed enemy takes all the damage from the attack.
Tanris deals 1d6 extra damage against any target granting combat advantage to him.
